raw_comment:
One thing I noticed is that younger people think the world is getting better.
I wonder why is it that younger people have a better outlook on life.
This relates to my community because I live in a place where some people have different ideas of how the world is changing.
Headline- "Is the World Getting Better-Different People Will Give Different Answers"
ace_sentences: Many young people think that the world is getting better.
I wonder why young people have a better outlook on life.
In this place, some people have different ideas about how the world is changing.
The headline is: Is the world getting better?
Different people will give different answers.
